articles.title: Study finds Neanderthals manufactured synthetic material with underground distillation - Phys.org
articles.description: Researchers at the Eberhard Karls University of Tübingen and colleagues in Germany have taken a closer look at the birch tar used to affix Neanderthal tools and found a much more complex technique for creating the adhesive than previously considered.

articles.title: 5 asteroids hurtling towards Earth at ferocious speed! NASA telescopes reveal details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed details about 5 asteroids that are hurtling towards Earth and are expected to pass at very close distances. Know their speed, distance of approach, size, and other details.
